sent.orig: Understand certification requirement, e.g. China sanitary certification, NSF requirement, and put it into design consideration.
sent.trans: 了解国内外涉水产品认证要求，如中国卫生认证、NSF认证等的要求，并在设计中考虑进去。

sent.orig: Requirement acquirement, description, verification is the main contents of the Requirement Engineering research.
sent.trans: 需求规格的获取、示以及验证是需求工程研究的核心。

sent.orig: In many projects, Requirement Management is in shortage or limited into requirement acquirement and analysis itself.
sent.trans: 在大量的软件项目管理实践中，需求管理或者完全欠缺，或者是仅仅停留在需求获得和需求分析上。

sent.orig: Take part in requirement communication, make feasibility analysis according to requirement, and write corresponding design documents.
sent.trans: 参与需求交流，根据需求文档，进行可行性分析，并撰写相应的设计文档。

sent.orig: The primary requirement of war is to destroy the enemy, and the other requirement is self-preservation.
sent.trans: 战争的基本要求是：消灭敌人；其另一要求是：保存自己。
